creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: abstract image; large, wavy peach shape in center with triangular points extending from all sides, and intersecting lines connecting to points; lowercase letters placed around points, in black pigments except for a capital letter 'A' in white pigment in URQ; gradated blue background; vertical purple rectangle in UR edge; orange square in LLC; wavy gray 'horizon' at B edge
signed: LRC, in gray pigment: K. Nakahashi
title: One Scene at the Small Meeting
